entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0207.10722] The filer has reported a value for the concept InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue with a value of 2,720,000. This concept is used to report the fair value of investments for the mrcc:HotelsGamingLeisureMember industry. The filer has reported a value for the concept InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue with a value of 10,582,000 that includes the member mrcc:HotelsGamingLeisureMember but also has additional members. This value is used to report the fair value of investments for the following dimensions us-gaap:InvestmentCompanyNonconsolidatedSubsidiaryAxis=mrcc:MRCCSeniorLoanFundILLCMember, us-gaap:EquitySecuritiesByIndustryAxis=mrcc:HotelsGamingLeisureMember, us-gaap:InvestmentTypeAxis=us-gaap:SeniorLoansMember, us-gaap:InvestmentIssuerAffiliationAxis=us-gaap:InvestmentUnaffiliatedIssuerMember. The value representing the fair value of investments in the mrcc:HotelsGamingLeisureMember industry is less than the value reported for the value 10,582,000 which is a subset of this industry. The value reported for the industry in aggregate should be more than or equal to the value reported for of 10,582,000. Please ensure that appropriate dimensions have been used to report these values.
Concept : us-gaap:InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue Value : 10,582,000 Period : 2022-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:EquitySecuritiesByIndustryAxis=mrcc:HotelsGamingLeisureMember, us-gaap:InvestmentIssuerAffiliationAxis=us-gaap:InvestmentUnaffiliatedIssuerMember, us-gaap:InvestmentCompanyNonconsolidatedSubsidiaryAxis=mrcc:MRCCSeniorLoanFundILLCMember, us-gaap:InvestmentTypeAxis=us-gaap:SeniorLoansMember
Rule Element Id:10722 Rule version: 27.0.0RC1 - mrcc-20231231.htm 5
